The National Assembly Commission , which is currently working on a bill for name changes , said : ‘ The final decision on the name of members of the National Assembly is , of course , up to the members themselves . ’

Independent schools are designed to prepare students – for further education , including at universities , for their desired career and for their role as world citizens .

Nelson Mandela once said , “ When you talk to a person in the language he understands , you reach his mind . ”

68 percent of students who have studied foreign languages have reached the so-called “ Higher grade A ” higher class A .

Language subjects have the same rank in the curricula of independent schools and elsewhere as MINT subjects ( mathematics , information technology , science and technology ) .

Regardless of the career someone chooses when he has learned a second language , he has a real advantage in the future with a lifelong ability like this .
